document_data.name: ''Returning Frost Dart''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Returning frost darts''''' were [[enchanted]] thrown weapons that flew back to the thrower's hand after reaching their targets.
document_data.Powers: These weapons were small enough to conceal them easily. Each dart bore markings of engraved words and lines of power. When they reached the target, ''returning frost darts'' had a chance of dealing magical cold damage and returned to the thrower's hand.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1312}}, ''returning frost dart'' were used by [[Aurilite]] [[Stormsister]]s and postulants who joined the [[Legion of the Chimera]] to bring destruction on the [[Ten Towns]] and [[Kuldahar]] of [[Icewind Dale]].
